name: Formulary
title: DaVinci Payer Data Exchange (PDex) US Drug Formulary
description: Da Vinci Payer Data Exchange (PDex) US Drug Formulary STU 1.0.1

resource.name: Formulary Coverage Plan
resource.description: A health plan which contains links to administrative information, a list of formulary drugs covered under that plan, and a definition of drug tiers and their associated cost-sharing models.

resource.name: Formulary Drug
resource.description: Drug information which is part of a formulary.

resource.name: Drug Alternatives
resource.description: Generic or Branded Drugs included within the CoveragePlan's formulary that could be prescribed as alternatives to the current FormularyDrug.

resource.name: Drug Tier Definition
resource.description: A description of the drug tiers used by the formulary and how those tiers implement copay and coinsurance amounts. Drug tiers do not have any inherent meaning that is consistent across all formularies. Rather, each tier is defined using this element.

resource.name: Drug Tier ID
resource.description: A code that describes the coverage status of a drug in a health plan (e.g., preferred generic, specialty, etc.)

resource.name: Support Contact
resource.description: An email address for developers/public to report mistakes in the network and formulary data.

resource.name: Formulary URL
resource.description: The URL that goes directly to the formulary brochure for the specific standard plan or plan variation.

resource.name: Marketing URL
resource.description: The URL that goes directly to the plan brochure for the specific standard plan or plan variation.

resource.name: Network
resource.description: Array of Networks within a plan.

resource.name: Plan ID
resource.description: Unique, 14-character, HIOS-generated Plan ID number. (Plan IDs must be unique, even across different markets.)

resource.name: Plan ID Type
resource.description: Type of Plan ID. For all Marketplace plans this should be: HIOS-PLAN-ID

resource.name: Prior Authorization
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a prior authorization requirement on this drug.

resource.name: Quantity Limit
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a quantity limit on this drug.

resource.name: Step Therapy Limit
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a step therapy limit on this drug.

resource.name: Summary URL
resource.description: The URL that goes directly to the formulary brochure for the specific standard plan or plan variation.

resource.name: Qualifier for coinsurance rate
resource.description: Qualifier for coinsurance rate

resource.name: Qualifier of copay amount
resource.description: Qualifier of copay amount

resource.name: Drug tier of medication in health plan
resource.description: The drug tier of a particular medication in a health plan. The base set are examples. Each plan may have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Type of pharmacies
resource.description: Types of pharmacies. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Code for qualifier for coinsurance rate
resource.description: Code for qualifier for coinsurance rate

resource.name: Codes for qualifier of copay amount
resource.description: Codes for qualifier of copay amount

resource.name: Codes for medication drug tiers in health plans
resource.description: Codes to represent the drug tier of a particular medication in a health plan.  Base set are examples.  Each plan may have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Codes for types of pharmacies
resource.description: Codes for types of Pharmacies. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.
